jmud
Class ChatColor

java.lang.Object
  jmud.ChatColor

public abstract class ChatColor
extends java.lang.Object

Holds a representation for ANSI color codes and provides methods for color formatting strings.

Author:
Will Pall

Method Detail

colorFormat

public static java.lang.String colorFormat(java.lang.String chatMessage)
Formats a message to replace the color tokens with ANSI color codes.

Parameters:
chatMessage - The raw message to format
Returns:
The formatted message

stripColorTokens

public static java.lang.String stripColorTokens(java.lang.String chatMessage)
Removes all color from an unformatted string.

Parameters:
chatMessage - The raw message to strip tokens from
Returns:
The original message with all color tokens stripped
